name: Daleks: a "Dalek attack" C64 clone in basic
name_original: Daleks: a "Dalek attack" C64 clone in basic
description:
For the Dalek Attach Challenge on Retro Programmers Inside Facebook group, here you are my implementation, written in basic and with source code available. 

My big thank-you to Frida Katarina for the opening petscii, she is a so talented girl!
